meta.name: description
meta.content: Apollo-Ridge School District serves students and is located in Spring Church, PA.

article.aria-label: APOLLO-RIDGE APRIL BOARD MEETING TO BE HELD VIRTUALLY

div.style: background-image: url(https://3.files.edl.io/7816/20/04/25/155112-d8d803fd-ca16-4324-b0e9-57a3bcef3809.jpg)

h3.a: APOLLO-RIDGE APRIL BOARD MEETING TO BE HELD VIRTUALLY

div.div: The Apollo-Ridge Board of Directors will hold the Legislative Board Meeting virtually using Zoom on Monday, April 27, 2020 starting at 6:30 pm. The change in location and venue is due to health and safety precautions with regard to the COVID-19 pandemic. The public may attend the meeting electronically by visiting the website Zoom.us or calling 1-646-558-8656 (toll charges may apply). The meeting ID number is 983-2782-9377 and password is 732306.
Students who met the criteria announced by Apollo-Ridge High School Guidance Office.
